description: This Dart source file defines the WishlistScreen widget, which displays a list of books in the user's wishlist in a 2-column grid layout, with functionality to navigate to product details and move items to the cart.

classes.name: WishlistScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders a wishlist in a grid layout with navigation and interaction capabilities.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product detail page for a given book.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the wishlist screen, displaying the number of items and a grid of book cards.
